title: Authors and Citation
text: package maintainer. Maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Ww (2021). gfdata: Package (Title Case). R package version 0.1.0, https://benwilliams-noaa.github.io/gfdata.
code: @Manual{,   title = {gfdata: What the Package Does (Title Case)},   author = {Who wrote it},   year = {2021},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   url = {https://benwilliams-noaa.github.io/gfdata}, }

what: copy the previous SSC accepted model as the new
title: copy the previous SSC accepted model as the new
text: copy base model files, also add "base_model.txt" file identifies model used

title: copy the previous SSC accepted model as the new
code: accepted_model(base_year, base_model, year, folder = NULL)

title: copy the previous SSC accepted model as the new
text: base_year year base model base_model name base model (folder name) year current year folder base model different location groundfishr structure looking

title: copy the previous SSC accepted model as the new
code: if (FALSE) { accepted_model(base_year = 2020, base_model = "m18.2b", year = 2021) }

text: year assessment year akfin_user user name akfin_pwd user password afsc_user user name afsc_pwd user password off_yr -year assessment change TRUE

title: Sablefish historical abundance data — sabl_fixed_abundance
text: dataset containing fixed gear trawl gear catch, cpue, rpn & rpw data year

title: Sablefish historical abundance data — sabl_fixed_abundance
code: sabl_fixed_abundance

title: Sablefish historical abundance data — sabl_fixed_abundance
text: data frame 121 observations 5 variables: year year value weight catch 1,000 t, relative abundance variable rpw, rpn, cpue, catch fleet japan domestic gear lls = longline survey, llf = longline fishery, tf = trawl fishery

code: sabl_fixed_comps

title: Sablefish age and length comp data — sabl_fixed_comps
